title: Iranian filmmaker urges Tehran: Let banned director go to Cannes
text:
Iranian filmmaker urges Tehran: Let banned director go to Cannes 6:28pm BST - 01:56
Double-Oscar winning filmmaker Asghar Farhadi has made a last-minute plea to Iran to let a fellow Iranian director Jafar Panahi, who is officially banned from working and travelling, to come to the premiere of his own film. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Double-Oscar winning filmmaker Asghar Farhadi has made a last-minute plea to Iran to let a fellow Iranian director Jafar Panahi, who is officially banned from working and travelling, to come to the premiere of his own film.
